item.title: Capitol Police arrest dozens of people protesting Medicaid cuts in Trump budget bill
item.description: President Donald Trump's budget bill, which is currently with the Senate, includes deep cuts to Medicaid.

item.title: Trump threatens tough trade deal for Spain after it refuses to meet NATO defense spending target

item.title: Trump says U.S. and Iran will meet next week
item.description: A ceasefire agreed to by Israel and Iran appears to be holding after it was announced by President Donald Trump.
